title: Rain in the southern part of Kyushu

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Radio news broadcast (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What does the forecast say about rain in the southern part of Kyushu?

choices.label: Beginning tomorrow, it will rain for several days.
Sun will alternate with scattered showers.
It will be cloudy but not rain.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
